%%% Use of an extended color table %%%
\usepackage[usenames,dvipsnames]{color}
\usepackage[usenames,dvipsnames]{xcolor}
% Define the (old) FHTW corporate design colors %
\definecolor{twgray}{RGB}{99,106,111}
\definecolor{twgreen}{RGB}{0,146,110}
\definecolor{twblue}{RGB}{10,143,217}
\definecolor{tuwblue}{RGB}{00,102,153}

%%% Package to format page headers and footers %%%
\usepackage[automark,headsepline]{scrlayer-scrpage}
\clearpairofpagestyles
% Define footer & header
\cfoot[\pagemark]{\pagemark}
\lehead{\headmark}
\rohead{\headmark}

%%% Package to suppress wrongly asserted warning about TOC %%%
\usepackage{scrhack}

%%% Package to format default page layout %%%
\usepackage[margin=2cm]{geometry}

% Define for text usable height per page
\setlength{\textheight}{245mm}
% Define line spacing (120%)
\usepackage{setspace}
\setstretch{1.2}
% Fix linespacing of bibliography to 100%
\usepackage{etoolbox}
\AtBeginEnvironment{thebibliography}{\setstretch{1}\selectfont}

% Enable for colored headlines
\setkomafont{chapter}{\color{tuwblue}\mdseries\Huge}
\setkomafont{section}{\color{tuwblue}\mdseries\huge}
\setkomafont{subsection}{\color{tuwblue}\mdseries\Large}
\setkomafont{subsubsection}{\bfseries\normalsize}
% Define default font size and family
\renewcommand*{\familydefault}{\sfdefault}\selectfont
\normalfont\selectfont

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
